extendedInfo.description: This is a one-stop app that provides expert advice and tips on how to grow and care for palm trees. It also has a large database of palm trees with detailed profiles and photos for each tree. With over 2,500 different palm tree species in the world it can be hard to pick the right palm for your garden. Let us help you create a tropical oasis of your dreams. In this app you will learn: *How to choose a palm tree *How to plant a palm tree *How to care for palm trees *Top 10 palm tree transplanting mistakes *5 Important palm tree watering Q&A *How to prevent palm tree from nutritional deficiency *How to identify palm trees *Top 10 palm tree care mistakes *15 Most popular palm trees *and much more.

reviews.title: Excellent idea, poor execution
reviews.comment: I own several different types of palms, and as a novice this app was a great tool picking out palms and the very basics.  It would be so much better if it had more in depth care practices for each individual palm.  It would be great if it had contacts that you could consult and even a user message board to discuss information with other growers.  And if the articles were updated once in while would be tremendously help full!  Other than that its a great place to start for beginers.   Thank you!
reviews.author: Brad Earley
